import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
pd.set_option('display.max_columns', 100)
ipl = pd.read_csv("../input/ipl-data-set/matches.csv")
source.34b4620e:

plt.title("Maximum toss winners")
plt.show()
